name: Danang - Son Tra Peninsula - Ba Na Hills - Cham Islands - Hoi An (4 Days, 3 Nights)
description: Danang is a coastal city with white sand beaches stretching longer than 60 km, it was voted one of the six most attractive beaches in the world by Forbes magazine. Diving into the clear waters, playing with the waves and taking sunbathe on the fine white sand that's all enough to give anyone the sense of wonderful relaxation after hours of work. Not only that, there are plenty of water sports for you to experience such as canoeing, parasailing, windsurfing, banana rafting, motorboats and scuba diving.
